tha-ap396:18.2: Sampupphite → supupphite (s2, s3) | samphīte (pts1), sañchanne → vappadese (s2, s3) | ca chappade (pts1)
tha-ap396:19.1: Majjhe mahante hīne ca → majjhe mayhaṃ bhavā assu (s2, s3, pts1, mr)
tha-ap396:19.2: bhave sabbe atikkamiṃ → ye bhave samatikkamiṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | yo bhavesu pakittayi (mr)
